content:
Brigada Siete (transl.â€‰brigade seven) is a Philippine television investigative documentary show broadcast by GMA Network. It premiered on December 5, 1993. The show concluded on September 29, 2001. The show was revived in 2011 as Brigada.
After Louie Beltran's death by 1994, Tito Sotto took over on November 6 and continued his role until 2000. By that time, it was reformatted as a magazine show.
